get_full_boxscore[source]

get_full_boxscore(cz_event_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_draw_id:Optional[int]=None, game_number:Optional[int]=None, cz_game_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, **request_kwargs)

Returns a curling boxscore (dict) with data hash based on the cz_event_id, cz_draw_id and game_number or the cz_game_id. get_full_boxscore limits the number of get_requests that are made to the CurlingZone site.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_game_info[source]

get_game_info(soup, soup_type, game_kwargs, draw_kwargs)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

hash_game[source]

hash_game(game_dict, hash_type='sha256', encoding='utf-8')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_page_soup[source]

get_page_soup(soup_type, url_kwargs, **request_kwargs)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

request_type[source]

request_type(cz_event_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_draw_id:Optional[int]=None, game_number:Optional[int]=None, cz_game_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_boxscore[source]

get_boxscore(cz_event_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_draw_id:Optional[int]=None, game_number:Optional[int]=None, cz_game_id:Optional[str]=None, **request_kwargs)

Returns a curling boxscore (dict) based on the cz_event_id, cz_draw_id and game_number or the cz_game_id. Not recommended for use as it makes too many get requests (slow). Use get_full_boxscore instead.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_all_boxscores_from_linescore_page[source]

get_all_boxscores_from_linescore_page(cz_event_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_draw_id:Optional[int]=None, **request_kwargs)
